channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Tested and Reviewed Mesh Wi-Fi Routers of 2024
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: This is how bad China’s startup scene looks now
item.description: In early 2018, VC Mike Moritz wrote in the FT that “Silicon Valley would be wise to follow China’s lead,” noting the pace of work at tech companies wa...

item.title: The Music Industry’s ’90s Hard Drives Are Dying
item.description: The hard disk drives that the music industry relied on to archive a generation of albums are increasingly unreadable.

item.title: Fei-Fei Li’s World Labs comes out of stealth with $230M in funding
item.description: Fei-Fei Li, the Stanford professor many deem the “Godmother of AI,” has raised $230 million for her new startup, World Labs, from backers including An...

item.title: This Digital Archivist Believes Hollywood’s ‘Competition Era’ Is Over
item.description: “It’s as if television, media, and filmmaking are becoming manifest destiny in the wrong ways,” says Maya Cade, founder of the Black Film Archive. “An...

item.title: Fintech Bolt is buying out the investor suing over Ryan Breslow’s $30M loan
item.description: Bolt says it has settled its long-standing lawsuit with its investor Activant Capital. One-click payments startup Bolt is settling the suit by buying ...

item.title: The $129 AirPods 4 Have Features the $549 AirPods Max Don’t
item.description: Without the H2 chip, Apple’s flagship headphones bizarrely can’t do key things its basic buds now can.

item.title: Dave and Varo Bank execs are coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: The rise of neobanks has been fascinating to witness, as a number of companies in recent years have grown from merely challenging traditional banks to...

item.title: The Bird Flu Outbreak Takes a Mysterious Turn
item.description: US health officials say they don’t know how a patient in Missouri contracted bird flu.

item.title: First impressions of OpenAI o1: An AI designed to overthink it
item.description: OpenAI released its new o1 models on Thursday, giving ChatGPT users their first chance to try AI models that pause to “think” before they answer. Ther...
